channel.title: Help with antilag.java!
channel.description: Ok you no how the antilag.java is supposed to reset your server every 30min or so..... well it dosn't work ive tryed editing the reset timers but i think im doing it wrong if anyone can give me there reset timer off their working antilag.java so it will actually reset the server thanks so much![br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2007, 06:46:26 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: Help with antilag.java!
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

first of all antilag.java has to be loaded. in

server.java where all the null’s are like

    public static itemspawnpoints itemspawnpoints    = null;
    public static NPCHandler      npcHandler         = null;
    public static ObjectHandler   objectHandler      = null;
    public static PlayerHandler   playerHandler      = null;

add…

public static antilag antilag = null;

inside main method where all the classes gets initialized

add

antilag = new antilag();

in the while(!shutdownServer){

add

antilag.process();

and your done

Read full topic
